text:
Heavy Vehicle National Law (Tasmania)

The Heavy Vehicle National Law, as in force from time to time, set out in the Schedule to the Heavy Vehicle National Law Act 2012 of Queensland is applied (with modifications) as a law of Tasmania by the Heavy Vehicle National Law (Tasmania) Act 2013 and, as so applying, may be referred to as the Heavy Vehicle National Law (Tasmania)

1. Commencement
    The provisions of the Heavy Vehicle National Law (other than Chapter 2, Chapter 6 and Division 8 of Part 9.3) were applied (with modifications) as a law of Tasmania on 10 February 2014.

2. Further information
    The full text of the Heavy Vehicle National Law is set out in the Schedule to the Heavy Vehicle National Law Act 2012 of Queensland (click on INFORMATION for a link to Queensland legislation). See the Heavy Vehicle National Law (Tasmania) Act 2013 for modifications to the Heavy Vehicle National Law as it applies in Tasmania.
